name: Buying Time
content: To something that meant so much
Till they give in and just give up
I don't wanna be the first
But I know what we need to say
We know what's in the cards
The letting go gets harder babe
I wish love could be enough
But let's not talk about it now
It don't matter what it costs
Leave all the lights down low
Let's hold on a little longer
But we know what's in the cards
The letting go gets harder babe
I wish love could be enough
But let's not talk about it now
It don't matter what it costs
Hold on long as we can
We know what's in the cards
The letting go gets harder babe
I wish love could be enough
But let's not talk about it now
It don't matter what it costs
